name: PF Competitive Analysis Ontology
description: Generalized ontology for analyzing competitors across any market domain, configurable for specific organizations, sectors, and competitive contexts
creator: Platform Framework Architecture Team

TargetOrganization.description: The client organization for whom competitive analysis is being conducted in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Client organizations are fundamentally organizations with additional competitive context for [MARKET_DOMAIN]

CompetitorOrganization.description: Organizations that compete in the [MARKET_DOMAIN] space within [MARKET_SUBSECTOR]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Competitors are organizations with specific competitive attributes in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

MarketOffering.description: Products and services offered in the [MARKET_DOMAIN] within [MARKET_SUBSECTOR]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: [MARKET_DOMAIN] solutions are products/services with specialized domain features

MarketSegment.description: Distinct segments within the [MARKET_DOMAIN] market in [GEOGRAPHICAL_SCOPE]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Market segments are abstract market concepts applicable to any domain

CompetitivePosition.description: An organization's position relative to competitors in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Competitive positions are abstract strategic concepts applicable across domains

ValueProposition.description: The unique value offered by an organization or offering in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Value propositions are abstract business concepts applicable across domains

CompetitiveAnalysis.description: Analytical report or assessment of competitive landscape in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Competitive analyses are structured documents/reports across any domain

BlueOceanOpportunity.description: Market opportunities with minimal direct competition in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Blue ocean opportunities are strategic market concepts applicable across domains

CompetitiveIntelligence.description: Structured intelligence about competitors and market dynamics in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Intelligence reports are structured information products across domains

StrategicObjective.description: Organizational objectives and key results (OKRs) driving competitive strategy in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Strategic objectives are abstract organizational concepts

competes_with.description: Indicates direct competitive relationship between organizations in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

direct_competitor.description: Identifies the 3-5 most direct competitors requiring strategic focus in [MARKET_DOMAIN]
direct_competitor.businessRule: Must identify 3-5 primary competitors for strategic focus in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

operates_in_segment.description: Organization operates within specific market segments in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

delivers_value.description: Market offering delivers specific value proposition

analyzes_competitor.description: Analysis focuses on specific competitors in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

identifies_opportunity.description: Analysis identifies blue ocean opportunities in [MARKET_DOMAIN]

targets_segment.description: Value proposition targets specific market segments

informs_objective.description: Competitive analysis informs strategic objective decisions

references_vsom.description: Value proposition references Value Proposition Ontology (VSOM) framework

businessRules.description: Every TargetOrganization must identify 3-5 direct competitors in [MARKET_DOMAIN]
BlueOceanOpportunity must have competitiveBarriers = 'Low' or 'None' to qualify as true blue ocean
CompetitorOrganization must operate in at least one MarketSegment within [MARKET_DOMAIN]
Direct competitors must be marked with threatLevel for prioritization
businessRules.rule: CompetitorOrganization.direct_competitor = true IMPLIES CompetitorOrganization.threatLevel IS NOT NULL

businessRules.description: StrategicObjective must have at least one measurable keyResult

query_patterns: Who are the direct competitors to [TARGET_ORG_NAME] in [MARKET_DOMAIN]?
Identify Blue Ocean opportunities in [MARKET_SEGMENT] within [GEOGRAPHICAL_SCOPE]
Compare competitive positioning between [ORG1] and [ORG2] in [MARKET_DOMAIN]
What are the key differentiators for [VALUE_PROPOSITION] in [MARKET_SUBSECTOR]?
How do [TARGET_ORG_NAME]'s OKRs align with competitive opportunities in [MARKET_DOMAIN]?
What VSOM elements support competitive advantage in [MARKET_SEGMENT]?
reasoning_support: Competitive gap analysis across any market domain
Market opportunity identification within specified geography
Strategic positioning recommendations based on OKR alignment
Threat assessment and prioritization by market subsector
Value proposition optimization using VSOM framework
Blue ocean strategy development for specified timeframes
graph_traversal: Find all competitors in same market segment and geography
Trace value proposition to target segments and customer needs
Identify competitive clusters and partnership ecosystems
Map strategic objectives to competitive opportunities
Connect VSOM elements to competitive differentiators
